\begin{array}{l}\nm \angle L K M=7 x-5 \\\nm \angle N K M=3 x+9 \\\n\qquad \frac{1}{M} \int_{x}^{M}\n\end{array}[imath]m \angle L K M=7 x-5 [/imath] [imath]m \angle N K M=3 x+9 [/imath] [imath]\qquad \frac{1}{M} \int_{x}^{M}[/imath]
